General.Name: SICC Co. Ltd.
General.Description: SICC Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of silicon carbide semiconductor materials in China and internationally. It offers conductive silicon carbide substate materials and semi-insulating substrate materials. The company's products are used in microwave electronics, power electronics and other fields. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Jinan, China.
